caption.p:
The effect of cytokine mRNA expression level in influenza B virus-infected A549 cells after treatment with Lianhua-Qingwen.
∗∗∗
P < 0.001 compared to control via t-test. (a) CCL-5/RANTES. (b) IL6. (c) CXCL8/IL8. (d) CXCL10/IP-10. (e) TNF- α. (f) CCL2/MCP-1. (g) CCL4/MIP-1 β. (h) IFN- λ1.
